title: Special mode - minion waves
body:
http://www.12up.com/posts/4417753-video-vandiril-abuses-practice-mode-with-massive-minion-wave?a_aid=40727

Saw this - thought it might be fun to do out of practice mode.

So what about a rotating mode (like urf etc) where you can plant a "friendly bait" ward to build up a minion wave. Obviously the sacrifice is periodic wave pressure.

would be interesting.

replies.body: You can also do it in all for one with anivia walls.
Oooh i hadn't thought of that!
If you level them up first and continually have a few people spam it (think 3), you can stop the minions. Then get baron buff and let them go.
You can do that, get a team of ZZ Rot's and you can do it that way.
